info.description: A comprehensive API for managing addresses, offering endpoints for creation, update, deletion, and retrieval of Message Gateway data
info.title: Message Gateway API

get.description: Fetches SMS Aggregate report Applicationwise, Templatewise and Providerwise

put.description: Allows editing of an existing Message Application
Toggles the status of Message Application
put.summary: Modifies the status of Message Application

post.description: This API reads the output Excel file, constructs messages, and sends them to the NIC service in XML format.

200.description: True if validation succeeds, false otherwise
All Message service providers are retrieved

post.description: Creates a new Message Service Provider

get.description: Fetches Message Service Provider by ProviderID
get.summary: Get Message Service Provider by ProviderID

200.description: Message Provider is retrieved by ProviderID

put.description: Allows editing of an existing Message Provider
Toggles the status of Message Provider
put.summary: Modifies the status of Message Provider

post.description: Creates message requests for application for registered templates
Creates a new Message template for message applications

get.description: Fetch template details based on the provided query parameters such as TemplateLocalID, ApplicationID, and Templateformat.

parameters.example: Dear {#var#}, your {#var#} is scheduled on {#var#}. Pl check details over {#var#} - INDPOST
parameters.name: template-format

get.description: Fetches Message Template names by ApplicationID
get.summary: Get Message Template names by ApplicationID

200.description: Message Template names are retrieved by ApplicationID
Message Template is retrieved by TemplateLocalID

put.description: Allows editing of an existing Message Template
Modifies the status of Message Template
put.summary: Modifies the status of Message Template

post.description: Creates a new test message requests

message.description: Descriptive message providing details about the error.

status_code.description: HTTP status code representing the error type (e.g., 404 for Not Found).

success.description: Success flag to indicate if the operation was successful.

message_text.example: Your OTP is : 1342789 for Account_Creation. Please keep it for further references

template_format.example: Dear {#var#}, Greetings from India Post on the occasion of {#var#} - Indiapost

test_msg.example: Your Transaction is Successful. Your Order No is 906627, booked on : 180261

template_format.example: Standing Instruction {#var#} on Account No {#var#} was cancelled.
